ygData.subject: Stein Quest   was RE: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: I have trouble selling the Stein for a worthy amount of money.  Most buyers do not want to pay more than 100p. Not only that, but many players already have the
ygData.messageBody:
I have trouble selling the Stein for a worthy amount of money. Most buyers
do not want to pay more than 100p. Not only that, but many players already
have the stein and would not buy it anyway. As for being on the power list,
Money can only get you so much. I guess that if you had enough, you could
PAY others to group with you and kill the MOBs that you couldn't...

Brian




From: Jeremy Cobb <jeremy@...>

Any class that can get unlimited money at lvl 12 (Stein quest) is definetly
high up on the power list.
